changes.description: Implemented corrected NPV calculation using A+B-C formula with Net Equity, Annual Net Yield excluding mortgage, and Annual Mortgage payments discounted at Real Hurdle Rate. Added user-adjustable Nominal Hurdle Rate slider (2%-15%)
Fixed critical sorting bug in Property Rankings - Real ROI now correctly displays different values from Real Appreciation Rate, includes cash flow calculations
Fixed Real ROI Annualized to include cash flow - now shows true investment returns combining appreciation + rental income over time
Updated Portfolio Health Score with Real ROI metrics, star ratings, and inflation-adjusted calculations
Added S&P 500 to Economic Data and implemented inflation-adjusted purchase price calculations with real appreciation rates in property cards
Implemented personalized investment strategy generator with goal assessment and tailored recommendations
Added Economic Data tab with historical inflation, Case-Shiller index, and mortgage rates
Implemented mobile-first navigation with bottom nav and property comparison features with portfolio health scoring
Completed comprehensive product strategy review with cross-functional team recommendations
Added Y20 (Year 20) to all chart data points
Reverted to show y-axis numeric values and hidden y-axis labels instead
Hidden y-axis labels on charts by setting tick={false}
Fixed chart y-axis label cutoff by adding proper margins and width settings
